name: Skullz Bounz
description:
Simple but addictive. Run. Help the little skull to get out by tapping on the screen. The skull will bounz up and you only have to avoid the spikes. Sounds easy? So how far can you go?
«Skullz Bounz» is a one-touch-app with a lot of fun in a nice minimalistic style.

For the cultivated Skull-Lover out there – an other fine «Z-App» from Skullz23.
